description: Enterprise techniques used by Wiarp, ATT&CK software S0206 v1.0
name: Wiarp (S0206)

techniques.comment: Wiarp creates a backdoor through which remote attackers can open a command line interface.[2]
Wiarp connects to external C2 infrastructure over the HTTP port.[2]
Wiarp creates a backdoor through which remote attackers can create a service.[2]
Wiarp creates a backdoor through which remote attackers can inject files into running processes.[2]
Wiarp creates a backdoor through which remote attackers can download files.[2]
